title._content: Ehituses olev laev / A ship under construction

description._content: Ehituses olev laev. Käsmul on oluline koht eesti merenduse ajaloos – külas elasid paljud kaptenid ja laevaomanikud ning aastatel 1884-1931 tegutses siin merekool. Lisaks ehitati Käsmus ka laevu, eriti alates 19. sajandi teisest poolest, sealjuures ka suuremaid, hiljem ookeani ületanud purjekaid. - - - A ship under construction. Käsmu has an important place in Estonias maritime history –mostly captains and shipowners resided in the village and there was a maritime school from 1884 to 1931. Also ships were built in Käsmu, especially from the second half of the 19th century, including larger sailing ships, which later crossed the ocean. ca 1900 Viitekood / Reference code: EAA.1451.1.109.9.26 Kirje andmebaasis FOTIS / Description in the database FOTIS: www.ra.ee/fotis/index.php?type=2&id=9552
